explains: n. （商业经济的）下降，衰退期
wordGroup: economic downturn 经济低迷；经济不景气；经济滑坡

sentences.en: They predicted a severe economic downturn.
sentences.cn: 他们预言将会有一次严重的经济衰退。

sentences.en: The current economic downturn is markedly different from previous recessions.
sentences.cn: 目前的经济衰退和以前的经济衰退明显不同。

sentences.en: "Even before the downturn, companies were looking for individuals with strong communication skills," Fay says.
sentences.cn: Fay 说：“即使是在低迷时期之前，公司也在寻找有强大沟通技巧的人。”
